note:
I miss President Obama. I slept better back then. My first instinct upon waking wasn’t to grab my iPad to see what the moron had done now to crumple our democracy.

We live in a wackadoodle time. Religious leaders embrace Trump, the GOP cover for him, & his cult worship him. It certainly seems like the world’s upside down. But it’s not.

The Truth still matters. We’ve got one shot to save our Democracy: Vote Blue 2020!
